name: RiceSelect
0:
”Alexa, ask rice select what ingredients do i need to make Couscous Avocado Boats”
”Alexa, ask rice select how to make a Layered Caprese Rice Salad”
”Alexa, ask rice select what's the recipe for Mushroom Risotto”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: rice select
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The RiceSelect Skill from Amazon Alexa helps families prepare delicious meals by providing convenient hands-free access to dozens of recipes using Rice Select brand products. 

Recipes Included:
• Couscous Avocado Boats
• Stuffed Acorn Squash
• Layered Caprese Rice Salad
• Couscous Stuffed Roasted Tomatoes
• Arborio Silk Torte
• Gluten Free Banana Rice Waffles
• Mushroom Risotto
• Wild Rice Sausage Stuffed Mushrooms
• Peachy Keen Rice Bake
• Horchata
• Cinnamon Crunch Cookies
• Creamy Curry Carrot Soup
• Quinoa Meatball Sliders
• Red Beans and Rice
• Meat Lover's Texmati Paella
• Spicy Thai Rice
• Spring Pesto Picnic Salad
• Asparagus Risotto
• Chicken Burrito Skillet
• Vegan Rice Bowl
• Creamy Lemon Chicken and Rice
• Rice Stuffed Fish Tacos
• Roasted Vegetable Rice
• Classic Stuffed Peppers
• Turkey Taco Skillet
• Cheesy Broccoli Rice
• Fresh Pea Risotto
• Roast Chicken and Rice
